body:
Comment 7: 
Re #6, bin GOARCH should be the same as the $GOARCH.

we don't care the go.exe/godoc.exe/gofmt.exe $GOARCH.
we just use the bin/* as a simple tool.

but i need use amd64/go.exe to build 386 target.
I don't think depends MinGW is a good way to solve the problem.

I install Go from binary package, and i don't need cgo.
why should i install MinGW (I hate MinGW here)?
